title: What Makes This Quick Recipe for Seared Scallops So Irresistible?
sub_head: Three words: warm bacon vinaigrette. The scallops and their savory dressing are ready in 15 minutes flat.
body:
KNOWN AS A Southern chef and the owner of four Atlanta restaurants—not to mention a veteran of San Francisco’s Zuni Café—Anne Quatrano has, over the years, also found culinary inspiration in New England, on Nantucket. ”Most of my industry friends, I met on the island. I visit a few times a year. I have to see the water,” she said.
At Ms. Quatrano’s restaurants, she carefully sources the ingredients; almost everything comes from local producers. But she flies in bay scallops. “I only get them from Nantucket, from a specific guy,” Ms. Quatrano said. “I love them. They’re sweet and taste of the ocean.”
